name: 顏毅廣
objective: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題。
schedule:
Chapter 1 Introduction (w1)
Chapter 2 Introduction to Conduction (w2)
Chapter 3 One-Dimensional, Steady-State Conduction (w3-4)
Chapter 4 Two-Dimensional, Steady-State Conduction (w5-6)
Chapter 5 Transient Conduction (w7-8)
Midterm Exam (w9)

Chapter 6 Introduction to Convection (w10)
Chapter 7 External Flow (w11-12)
Chapter 8 Internal Flow (w13-14)
Chapter 9 Free Convection (w15)
Chapter 12 Radiation: Processes and Properties (w16-17)
Final Exam (w18)
scorePolicy:
Homework and Quizzes : 30% 
Midterm Exam 35%
Final Exam 35%
materials:
Text book: Incropera, F. P., Dewitt,D. P., Bergmann, T.L., and Lavine, A.S., Fundamentals of Heat and Mass Transfer, (7th ed., 2007) 

Reference: Heat and Mass Transfer: Fundamentals & Applications, Fourth Edition, Yunus A. Cengel,  Afshin J. Ghajar McGraw-Hill, 2011
